title: William Wing Loring
creator: unknown
description: Cdv studio portrait of a man, standing, full length, right forearm resting on vase atop the end of a balustrade in front of pillar to right, holding glove in right hand, left arm held at 90 degrees at waist [left arm artificial limb] chair with top hat to right, painted backdrop and patterned floor, drape; wearing civilian clothing, including waistcoat with watch chain and double breasted frock coat; handwritten on obverse, "Genl Loring"; handwritten on reverse, "Genl. Loring C. S. Army" and "Genl. Loring of Fla." piece[s] of string threaded through holes at top of image;
subject: William Wing Loring
